Hypnosis , massage therapy , heal touch may improve quality life patient undergoing chemotherapy . DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Ovarian Cancer Fallopian Tube Cancer Patients Using Complementary Alternative Medicine
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine whether quality life improve patient epithelial ovarian , fallopian tube primary peritoneal cavity cancer receive hypnosis , massage therapy , heal touch standard chemotherapy compare patient receive standard chemotherapy alone . Secondary - Determine change immunologic response marker , chemotherapy side effect , complication rate patient . OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I ( standard therapy ) : Patients undergo standard chemotherapy epithelial ovarian , fallopian tube primary peritoneal cancer . - Arm II ( standard therapy complementary alternative medicine ) : Patients undergo chemotherapy arm I . Patients also undergo massage approximately 30 minute heal touch therapy approximately 30 minute course chemotherapy 1-6 hypnosis 30-60 minute course 1 , 2 , 4 . Quality life assess baseline , course 3 6 chemotherapy , 6 month completion study treatment . After completion study treatment , patient follow 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnose epithelial ovarian , primary peritoneal fallopian tube cancer , pathologic type stage , receive 6 cycle chemotherapy . Patients must sign informed consent Previous cancer skin cancer Previous chemotherapy experience Active substance abuse Schizophrenia Pregnant lactating
